ygData.subject: Bards and rubicite
ygData.msgSnippet: Talies, Wondering where you heard this rumor from?  I read on EQVault that rogues and shamans were soon going to lose the ability to wear rubicite but saw
ygData.messageBody:
Talies,

Wondering where you heard this rumor from? I read on EQVault that rogues
and shamans were soon going to lose the ability to wear rubicite but saw
nothing about bards being included. This may end up being a moot point if
the Solusek bard quests give bard unique armor. I think I would prefer
doing the quests, no matter how hard, versus camping for rubicite.

Galtin of E'ci

> And just because some of you actually read my messages, here is today's
> secret: Get your rubicite armour while you still can.
>
>
